EmailTemplate.name: AERO_GDPR_Data_Management_mih.OLD - AERO_Confirmation_SingleOptIn_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome! - Subscription Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> YOU'RE CONNECTED Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You have successfully subscribed to marketing communications* from Honeywell International Inc. and its affiliates and subsidiaries, and third parties that distribute our products and other trusted business partners.
That means you’ll be able to get exclusive updates about offerings, news and events, surveys, special offers and related topics.
Can’t wait? Check our website here. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace
*Marketing communications refers to communications about offerings, news and events, surveys, special offers, and related topics via telephone, email, and other forms of electronic communication (e.g., communications through social media platforms).
You can withdraw your consent from the receipt of marketing communications from Honeywell at any time by clicking here <[[https://pages1.honeywell.com/GlobalHoneywellUnsubscribe.html]]>.
